    • normalizeStats

      public void normalizeStats(int divisor)
      Normalizes stats against a divisor. This is useful when a season is run several times without resetting the Standings, allowing the client to average the season results against the number of season iterations.
      Parameters:
      divisor - The divisor used to normalize the results.
